summary: Comprehensive testing of Preciosa Modas e-commerce platform completed. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), frontend core features work well with some minor cart persistence and navigation issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Cart items not persisting after adding products - cart shows empty after navigation
Product cards sometimes have overlay issues preventing clicks

integration_issues.issue: Items added to cart are not maintained in cart state across page navigation

navigation_issues.issue: Contact and About pages redirect to home page instead of loading properly

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (user registration, login, admin login)
Product details page with price toggles and quantity controls
User account page with profile info and VIP WhatsApp section
Admin panel login and product/order management
Home page hero section, Black Friday banner, and feature cards
Order creation and management through admin panel
All 15 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix cart persistence issue - items added to cart are not being maintained in the cart state when navigating between pages. Also investigate routing issues for /contato and /sobre pages that redirect to home instead of loading properly.
